user_reaction: Can you look up a hotel called Carolina bed and breakfast?
error_text: Okay. Your train booking was successful. You'll owe 16.5 which can be paid at the station. The reference number is X58GNQ74 .
context: <user> I'd like some help finding a train leaving peterborough on tuesday. <system> Absolutely, do you want to leave or arrive by a certain time? <user> Leave after 10:15, please. <system> Unfortunately, there are no trains that leave after 10:15. <user> Okay what are the available train times? <system> i have booked you one leaving at 10.19. <user> OK, is it going to Cambridge? Can I have the reference number please? <system> there seems to be a break down in communication. Please restate the departure and arrival locations and the day and time. <user> I need a train from Peterborough to Cambridge on Tuesday, leaving after 10:15. <system> I have train TR1674 leaving at 10:48 and arriving at 11:38. Would you like to book tickets?<user> I need to book for one person, I will need the reference number. Also, I need to book a hotel called Caroline Bed and Breakfast, I need the address. <system>
